content: I'll definitely create a social media campaign to promote the UGC section. I'll share behind-the-scenes content and use relevant hashtags to attract vegan food enthusiasts. I'll also reach out to some influencers and bloggers in the vegan community to collaborate and share their recipes. Do you think it's a good idea to offer a free resource, like a vegan meal planning template, in exchange for email addresses to build my list and promote the UGC section?
